General.Name: Capitalworks Emerging Markets Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Capitalworks Emerging Markets Acquisition Corp does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to search on companies operating in consumer and consumer technology; financial and business services; healthcare and technology; and media and telecom sectors. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 353 Lexington Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10016
